channel.title: Posts on Bingchen Han's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Bingchen Han's Website

item.title: My First Blog Post
item.description: Welcome! This is my first blog post. On this page, I will share my learning experiences and development insights. Why Start a Blog? Record Learning Journey - Document my experience learning new technologies Share Knowledge - Help other learners solve problems Build Personal Brand - Showcase my skills and projects Tech Stack This website uses: Hugo - Static site generator GitHub Pages - Free website hosting service Markdown - Content writing language What’s Next Stay tuned for more articles and project sharing!
